did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University Office of Equal Opportunity records, 1971-1982.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University Office of Equal Opportunity.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Advisory Board minutes and reports and other records of the office.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Office of Equal Opportunity handled diversity, disability, sexual harassment and other inclusion issues. The director reported to the Vice President of Human Resources. The functions of this office were changed to the Office of Workforce Diversity and Inclusion (now the Department of Inclusion and Workforce Diversity) and Student Disability Services in 1999.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Advisory Board minutes and reports and other records of the office.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University Office of Equal Opportunity.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Office of Equal Opportunity Records, #10-5-1464. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
